message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am proposing a price of $950,000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer, but the price is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a compromise. I am willing to lower the price to $850,000 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me. However, $850,000 is still a bit too high for my budget. I can offer $750,000.
Considering your offer, Bob, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $825,000 for the product.
Alice, we're getting closer. I can see you're willing to be flexible, so I'll raise my offer to $780,000.
I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, Bob. To continue our negotiation, I propose a price of $810,000 for the product.
Alice, I feel like we're in the final stages of this negotiation. I'm willing to offer $800,000 to close the deal.
